Articles.Content:
I'll be the first to admit that when it comes to clever designs, my brain nope's out and I end up sticking an engine under some tanks under a pod.

My aeroplanes aren't much better unless I start playing with the offset tool, but they still consist of an engine behind some tanks behind a cockpit.

So it's no surprise that my entry here looks so tame, but the rules say I can't change it.

Which is a shame because I spent all morning making it better...

It's a lot more fun now and at least looks a bit more interesting, even if it's not exactly pretty, but what it loses in the beauty contest, it makes up for in the acrobatics department.

In spades...

So have fun, I did

The Ham Sandwich 2, Hamageddon!
